dcterms:creator: Diane Caussade
Nathalie Vallée
Nathalie Henrich Bernardoni
Jean-Marc Colletta
Silvain Gerber
Frédérique Letué
Marie-José Martinez
dcterms:description: The study analyzed and compared multimodal language productions by 10 individuals with Alzheimer's disease (AD) matched to 10 controls, focusing on disfluencies in speech and gestures.
dcterms:title: Multimodal Language Productions in Alzheimer's Disease
